thread.section_title: Futonland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Futonland | futonland.com
thread.title: Marina Talalaeva

author: Marina Talalaeva
title: Marina Talalaeva
text:
They have very good selection in their showroom in Greenpoint. Kevin was extremely helpful and knowledgeable. We needed something that functions as a sofa during day and turns into a queen size bed when we have guests over. What also was important is how easy it is for one person to open and close it. Kevin helped us find the perfect solution.
Our futon came 5 days later, it took guys about half an hour to set it up. We are extremely happy with our purchase.
